info.description:
Originally there was a story titled Tortured by Your Brother and Sister and was an interactive on this very website.

The story prospered and then was eventually deleted by the original owner when they removed their account.

This is my attempt to bring the story back. The only difference is that I only saved old chapters involving the brother - not the sister (so that will be excluded. I am sorry for any disappointment, but I didn't have those saved off the site). Please note that some of the chapters will not be 100% the same, either. I have given credit to the original authors of the chapters that I uploaded here. Note that whenever credit is given it is not my original content. My hope is that the story can gain some footing again and take off. Or at least satisfy those fans who can't read it anymore because it disappeared...

Your brother (Josh) finds a way to either control or shrink you to make you worship him. Its during the Christmas holidays, and your parents have gone on vacation and left you in charge of the house.
- Mainly fart and foot worship
- Dont name the main character, keep it as you
- Don't list the ages of any character
- Keep it all male this time around
- Use Good Grammar please
- Make sure to spell check, added chapters
